items.title: Stock Investing
items.description: Long-term value investing strategies, fundamental analysis, and portfolio design.
items.moreDescription: Learn how to invest in stocks for the long term, focusing on value investing strategies. This course covers fundamental analysis, portfolio design, and the principles of successful investing.

items.title: Analyzing Stock Trends
items.description: Explore trendlines, indicators, market phases, and chart patterns.
items.moreDescription: Dive into the world of stock trends and learn how to analyze them effectively. This course covers trendlines, indicators, market phases, and various chart patterns to help you make informed investment decisions.

items.title: Stock Market
items.description: Structure of exchanges, trading rules, indices, liquidity and participants.
items.moreDescription: Understand the structure of stock exchanges, trading rules, indices, liquidity, and the various participants in the market. This course provides a comprehensive overview of how the stock market operates.

items.title: Investing
items.description: Foundations of investing, portfolio management, styles, metrics, global markets.
items.moreDescription: Explore the foundations of investing, including portfolio management, investment styles, key metrics, and the dynamics of global markets. This course is designed to provide a solid understanding of the investment landscape.

items.title: Investing Practices
items.description: Best practices for asset selection, diversification, and rebalancing.
items.moreDescription: Learn the best practices for asset selection, diversification, and rebalancing in your investment portfolio. This course provides practical insights to enhance your investment strategies.

items.title: Tariff Explanation
items.description: Tariff refers to the U.S. import tax rate applied to foreign goods. Adjusting this rate alters costs for consumers and firms, setting off economic ripple effects.
items.moreDescription: Rising U.S. import tariffs have ripple effects across the entire economy. When tariffs increase (from 0% toward 100%), they act as a tax on traded goods, affecting prices, output, and financial markets. This deep-dive report presents an interactive causal visualization and analysis of how higher tariffs influence key macroeconomic indicators: international trade volume, inflation (CPI), corporate earnings & investment, overall GDP, the stock market, and household income & consumption. The goal is to make complex economic interdependencies intuitive ‚Äì using a radial causal graph with a tariff-level slider ‚Äì while grounding each link in solid economic theory and empirical evidence. By adjusting the tariff slider, users can observe dynamic changes  and access brief explanations for each causal link. The accompanying written analysis explains the theory (e.g. supply chain disruptions, deadweight loss, retaliation) and cites evidence from sources like the IMF, World Bank, WTO, Fed, OECD, and BEA to quantify these effects. This is a storytelling tool  to explore the economic impact of tariff policy in an engaging yet rigorous way.

items.title: Day Trading Strategies
items.description: Learn candlesticks, scalping, momentum plays, and intraday risk control.
items.moreDescription: Master day trading strategies with a focus on candlestick patterns, scalping techniques, momentum plays, and effective intraday risk control. This course is designed for traders looking to enhance their skills in fast-paced markets.

items.title: Impact of Global Events on Stocks
items.description: Geopolitical, economic, and crisis-based events affecting market sentiment.
items.moreDescription: Explore how geopolitical, economic, and crisis-based events impact market sentiment and stock prices. This course provides insights into the relationship between global events and trading strategies.

items.title: Economics

items.title: Ray Dalio

items.moreDescription: Delve into the life principles and economic models of Ray Dalio, founder of Bridgewater Associates. This course includes videos, insights into Bridgewater's culture and strategy, and a comprehensive overview of Dalio's investment philosophy.

items.title: Learning to Meditate
